ComicInfo.Series: Escape of the Living Dead: Airborne
ComicInfo.Summary: Cover variants include: regular; body count; gore; groovy cannibal; nightcrawlers; platinum foil; shocker; sneak attack; terror; wraparound; splatterstockAs the hippie passengers of a broken-down bus enjoy a comfortable, drug-induced haze, their practice of "free love" will slowly slip into a gut-wrenching orgy of death. Not suspecting that the surrounding woods are crawling with reanimated corpses that crave human flesh, the children of the Age of Aquarius begin a night of debauchery... And one by one, they will all face horrifying murder at the hands of the undead!
